x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: Enable responsive dashboard property for net new and upgrading customers. - Fix script on upgrade to set the property "glide.cms.enable.responsive_grid_layout" to true if it exists and equals to false.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Enable responsive dashboard property
